content.question: Which of the following will enable an economy to reach point F on the diagram above?

choices.label: Reallocating currently available resources from apple production to production of oranges
Reallocating currently available resources from orange production to production of apples
Fully allocating currently available and unemployed resources efficiently

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
